EDUCATION 2020 / Graduated in fashion and textile design from the Faculty of Natural Sciences and Engineering at University in Ljubljana. 2020/2021 - / Enrolled in MA program at the Faculty of Natural Sciences and Engineering at University in Ljubljana
title: about

contents:
THE COLLECTION OF PERSONAL DATA The personal data I collect may include your name, e-mail address, information you give me when you contact me and your navigation on my website.
When submitting your data on my website, it will always be stated whether the submission is voluntary or necesarry for completing the desired action. Your personal data is collected when you actively engage with the website and when you subscribe to my newsletter or contact me via contact form.
THE USE OF PERSONAL DATA The personal data I collect is used in connection with sign-ups for my newsletter and to perform analysis to help me identify people who are interested in my content. Please note that I will only use your personal data if you have given your consent.
I keep statistics about users’s use of my website ni order to improve the website. This data does not contain personal information. I do not sell or disclose information about how my users navigate and use my website to third parties.
TRANSFERRING DATA TO OTHER CONTROLLERS In general, I do not transfer your personal data to third parties withour your consent.
DISCLOSING DATA TO DATA PROCESSORS Your personal data is disclosed to my partners who deliver services on behalf of me; for example in relation to sending out newsletter. These partners only process the personal data on behalf of me and in accordance with my high security standards. I use the services of Mailerlite, located in Lithuania, EU.
DELETING YOUR PERSONAL DATA I will delete your personal data when I no longer need to process them, however the data may be processed and stored for a longer period in anonymized form.
YOUR RIGHTS You are at any time entiteled to be informed of the personal data about you that I process. You also have the right to object to the collection and further processing of your personal data. You have the right to have your personal data rectified, erased or blocked. Further more you have the right to receive information about you that you have provided to me and the right to have this information transmitted to another data controller.
WITHDRAWAL OF CONSENT You may, at any time, withdraw any consent you have given and I will delete your personal data, unless I can continue the processing based on another purpose. If you wish to withdraw your consent, please contact me at hello©morja.si
LINKS TO OTHER WEBSITES My website may contain links to other websited or to integrated sites. I am not responsible for the content of the websites of other companies or for the practices of such companies regarding the collection of personal data. When you visit other websites, you should read the owners' policies on the protection of personal data and other relevant policies.
CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY I may update this Privacy policy from time to time. If I make significant changes, I will let you know, but please check this policy regularly to ensure you are aware of the most updated version.
COOKIE POLICY This Cookie policy explains what cookies are and how we use them. You should read this policy so you can understand what type of cookies we use, the information we collect using cookies and how that information is used. For further information on how we use, store and keep your personal data secure, see our Privacy policy.
This Policy also tells you what your rights are in relation to the personal data you give to us. If you have any questions about this Cookie policy please contact:
WHAT ARE COOKIES Cookies are little text files which are stored on the browser or hard drive of your computer or mobile device when you visit a webpage or application. Cookies work to make your experience browsing our site as smooth as possible and they remember your preferences, so you don’t have to insert your details again and again.
Cookies can be stored for varying lengths of time on your browser or device. Session cookies are deleted from your computer or device when you close your browser. Persistent cookies will remain stored on your computer or device until deleted or until they reach their expiry date.
We use only Strictly Necessary cookies. These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems.
COOKIE LIST    Cookie name Description Provider Expiratory time     mailerlite:webform:shown: Tracks when our newsletter sign-up form is shown Mailerlite Persistent
title: Privacy policy Morja
